select s.sub_category_id, s.sub_category_name, p.post_id, p.title, case when length(p.content) > 20 then substr(p.content,0,20) || ' ...' else p.content end as "content", u.nickname, u.user_id, p.view_count, nvl(pl.like_point,0) as "like_point", count(c.post_id) as "comment_cnt", to_char(p.created_time,'MM.dd HH:mm') as "created_time" from posts p left join sub_category s on p.sub_category_id = s.sub_category_id left join comments c on p.post_id = c.post_id left join post_like pl on p.post_id = pl.post_id left join users u on p.user_id = u.user_id
upper(p.TITLE) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
upper(p.CONTENT) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
upper(p.TITLE) like upper(#{searchKeyword}) or upper(p.CONTENT) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
upper(u.user_id) like upper(#{searchKeyword}) or upper(u.nickname) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
group by s.sub_category_id, s.sub_category_name, p.post_id, p.title, p.content, u.nickname, u.user_id, p.view_count, pl.like_point, p.created_time
having s.sub_category_id = #{dto.subcategory}
order by p.created_time desc
order by "like_point" desc
